name: Bob Birdy
description:
Help Bob to fly through the lianas and (suspiciously) happy trees to reach the medicine. Use Slow Time and Ghost Mode potions to avoid Alphonse the squirrel and the bee swarm. Collect all the golden coins you can and be the first on the Leaderboard!

This game is completely family friendly. There are no in-app purchases, no ads, just pure and honest fun!

14 Languages! 
简体中文, English, Français, Deutsch, Magyar, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Polski, Română, Pусский, Español, ภาษาไทย, Türkçe.
